title: Count Mime Type
sql: SELECT ContentMimeType as ContentMimeType, COUNT(*) as Count FROM ApiCoreData WHERE CaseManagementUuid = :CaseManagementUuid GROUP BY ContentMimeType ORDER BY Count DESC

title: Content Type Grouped By Summed File Size (MB)
sql: SELECT ContentTypeName, SUM(ContentSize) as SumContentSize FROM ApiCoreData WHERE CaseManagementUuid = :CaseManagementUuid GROUP BY ContentTypeName ORDER BY SumContentSize DESC
description: A pie chart showing the summed disk size by the content type name in megabytes.

specification.description: A pie chart showing the summed disk size by the content type name in megabytes.

title: Static Example
sql: SELECT ContentTypeName, SUM(ContentSize) as SumContentSize FROM ApiCoreData WHERE CaseManagementUuid = :CaseManagementUuid GROUP BY ContentTypeName ORDER BY SumContentSize DESC

specification.description: A basic pie chart showing the distribution of different content mime types
